= Introduction =

LSP - Lomb-Scargle period determination program

You can form file like this

Obj=Objectname date=20101121 time=210101 dt=0.05
1  2
2  5
3  7

where time is in hour minutes and seconds, dt is time integration in seconds

= Details =

Add your content here.  Format your content with:
  * *Pstart* is period from what program should serch
  * *Pend* is period when program stop searching
  * *Step* define _resolusion_ of iterations
